title: Animals that build
creator_credit: Sidney Platt and National Geographic Society
brief_description: This film focuses on animals as engineers, constructing elaborate dwellings and protection devices. From tiny microscopic creatures like coral, insects like spiders and caterpillars through to birds and mammals like beavers and man, the program provides a useful insight into the natural world. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
